verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6680>"Command<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> to you <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H3795>beaten<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> to cause a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> to <S%H5927>burn<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

<S%H2351>Outside<s%> of the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H5715>Testimony,<s%> in the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> shall <S%H175>Aaron<s%> keep it in <S%H6186>order<s%> from <S%H6153>evening<s%> to <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8548>continually:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
He shall keep in <S%H6186>order<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> on the <S%H2889>pure<s%> gold <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

"You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> and <S%H644>bake<s%> <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of <S%H8147>it:<s%> two tenth parts of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> shall be in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2471>cake.<s%>

You shall <S%H7760>set<s%> them in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4634>rows,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> on a <S%H4635>row,<s%> on the <S%H2889>pure<s%> gold <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

You shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> on each <S%H4635>row,<s%> that it may be to the <S%H3899>bread<s%> for a <S%H234>memorial,<s%> even an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Every <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> day he shall set <S%H3117>it<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%> It is on the behalf of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

It shall be for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%> for it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to him of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>statute.<s%>"

The <S%H1121>son<s%> of an <S%H3482>Israelite<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> whose <S%H1121>father<s%> was an <S%H376>Egyptian,<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H3482>Israelite<s%> woman and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> strove <S%H5327>together<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

The <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H3482>Israelite<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H5344>blasphemed<s%> the <S%H8034>Name,<s%> and <S%H7043>cursed;<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> His <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H8019>Shelomith,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1704>Dibri,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>
They <S%H3240>put<s%> him in <S%H4929>custody,<s%> until the <S%H6310>will<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> should be declared to <S%H6567>them.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Bring <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H2351>of<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> him who <S%H7043>cursed;<s%> and let all who <S%H8085>heard<s%> him <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and let all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> stone <S%H7275>him.<s%>

You shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H376><s%> 'Whoever <S%H3588>curses<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

He who <S%H5344>blasphemes<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H7275>certainly<s%> <S%H7275>stone<s%> <S%H1616>him:<s%> the foreigner as well as the <S%H249>native-born,<s%> when he <S%H5344>blasphemes<s%> the <S%H8034>Name,<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
<S%H376><s%>"'He who strikes <S%H5315>any<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5221>mortally<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
He who strikes an <S%H5315>animal<s%> <S%H5221>mortally<s%> shall make it <S%H7999>good,<s%> <S%H5315>life<s%> for <S%H5315>life.<s%>
<S%H5414>If<s%> <S%H376>anyone<s%> <S%H3971>injures<s%> his <S%H5997>neighbor;<s%> as he has <S%H6213>done,<s%> so shall it be done to <S%H6213>him:<s%>

<S%H7667>fracture<s%> for <S%H7667>fracture,<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth;<s%> as he <S%H5414>has<s%> <S%H3971>injured<s%> <S%H120>someone,<s%> so shall it be done to <S%H5414>him.<s%>
He who <S%H5221>kills<s%> an <S%H929>animal<s%> shall make it <S%H7999>good;<s%> and he who <S%H5221>kills<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
You shall have <S%H259>one<s%> kind of <S%H4941>law,<s%> for the <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> as well as the <S%H249>native-born:<s%> for I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>'"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they brought <S%H3318>out<s%> him who had <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him with <S%H7275>stones.<s%> The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
